2.caption_en:
A Functional Integration Map of Apple that maps ecosystem layers (Sustainability, Engagement, Intelligence, Infrastructure, Success Factors) across domains like Home, Health, Work, Entertainment, Finance, Education and Mobility, showing products and services (e.g., HomeKit, Health, App Store, MacBook, iPad, Watch, Apple TV, CarPlay) positioned by layer and domain. The diagram highlights AppleID as a cross-cutting success factor linking devices and services.
